name: Mashed (itch)
description:
This game was made in  72 hours to compete in the Ludum Dare Jam 41 with the theme "mix 2 incompatible genres" so we decided to make a fighting game that involves cooking.

Our main goal with this game was to experiment around Gamefeel and camera effects.

Controls 

Player 01 : Mash "F" to punch

Player 02 : Mash "J" to punch

Credits
